scripts.deploy: npm run build && set AWS_SHARED_CREDENTIALS_FILE=./credentials && aws s3 sync --acl public-read --delete build/ s3://cv30.co && npm run invalidate
scripts.invalidate: set AWS_SHARED_CREDENTIALS_FILE=./credentials && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E37006VW3U4LCL --paths /*
scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar src/style -o src/ --watch --recursive
